data.lyric:
[ti:Waiting For Love (Remix)]
[ar:HEST]
[al:Wait For]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Waiting For Love (Remix) - HEST
[00:00.09]原唱：Avicii
[00:00.17]Lyrics by：Vincent Pontare/Simon Aldred/Salem Al Fakir/Tim Bergling/Martin Garrix
[00:00.42]Composed by：Vincent Pontare/Simon Aldred/Salem Al Fakir/Tim Bergling/Martin Garrix
[00:00.66]Where there's a will there's a way kinda beautiful
[00:04.35]And every night has its day so magical
[00:08.52]And if there's love in this life there's no obstacle
[00:12.44]That can't be defeated
[00:16.88]Monday left me broken
[00:19.92]Tuesday I was through with hopin'
[00:23.73]Wednesday my empty arms were open
[00:27.65]Thursday waiting for love waiting for love
[00:32.58]Thank the stars it's Friday
[00:35.38]I'm burning like a fire gone wild on Saturday
[00:39.49]Guess I won't be coming to church on Sunday
[00:43.47]I'll be waiting for love
[00:46.40]Waiting for love to come around
[00:50.27]
[00:51.77]We are one of a kind irreplaceable
[00:55.75]How did I get so blind and so cynical
[00:59.64]If there's love in this life we're unstoppable
[01:03.61]No we can't be defeated
[01:08.02]Monday left me broken
[01:10.97]Tuesday I was through with hopin'
[01:14.93]Wednesday my empty arms were open
[01:18.84]Thursday waiting for love waiting for love
[01:23.75]Thank the stars it's Friday
[01:26.46]I'm burning like a fire gone wild on Saturday
[01:30.63]Guess I won't be coming to church on Sunday
[01:34.54]I'll be waiting for love
[01:37.53]Waiting for love to come around
data.trans:
[ti:Waiting For Love (Remix)]
[ar:HEST]
[al:Wait For]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.09]//
[00:00.17]//
[00:00.42]//
[00:00.66]有志者 事竟成 多美好啊
[00:04.35]每个漫长的夜都有白昼 如此神奇
[00:08.52]如果怀有爱意生活 相信人生再无困难
[00:12.44]爱可以战胜一切
[00:16.88]周一的我 心碎不堪
[00:19.92]周二的我 怀揣一丝希望
[00:23.73]周三的我 展开空空如也的双臂
[00:27.65]周四的我还在等待爱 等待爱 
[00:32.58]繁星璀璨 周五了
[00:35.38]周六的我像是燃烧的烈焰 肆意疯狂
[00:39.49]暗想 我才不会周日去教堂
[00:43.47]我还在等待爱 等待爱
[00:46.40]等待爱降临
[00:50.27]
[00:51.77]我们独一无二 无可替代
[00:55.75]而我怎么会这么盲目 又这般愤世嫉俗
[00:59.64]如果有爱进驻生活 我们将无法抵挡
[01:03.61]我们将战胜所有
[01:08.02]周一的我 心碎不堪
[01:10.97]周二的我 怀揣一丝希望
[01:14.93]周三的我 展开空空如也的双臂
[01:18.84]周四的我还在等待爱 等待爱 
[01:23.75]繁星璀璨 周五了
[01:26.46]周六的我像是燃烧的烈焰 肆意疯狂
[01:30.63]暗想 我才不会周日去教堂
[01:34.54]我还在等待爱 等待爱
[01:37.53]等待爱降临
